gobblin.audit.values.policy.row

Class AbstractRowSelectionPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.audit.values.policy.row.AbstractRowSelectionPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RowSelectionPolicy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SelectAllRowSelectionPolicy

    public abstract class AbstractRowSelectionPolicy
extends Object
implements RowSelectionPolicy
    An abstract RowSelectionPolicy that contains references to ValueAuditRuntimeMetadata.TableMetadata and ColumnProjectionPolicy used by the ValueAuditGenerator. Concrete classes need to implement RowSelectionPolicy.shouldSelectRow(org.apache.avro.generic.GenericRecord)
